attributes.action: Have a portrait of HM The Queen in every college, university and school
attributes.additional_details: To help instil love for our nation and patriotism. At the moment there are attempts to destroy our history and culture often by those who are merely visitors with little true comprehension of our nation. Therefore, it is imperative that to defend our culture and our country which has endured so much in both the past and present that we ensure love for our country and our Queen is not discouraged, the way to start is with a portrait of HM for all to see.
attributes.background: Fund the printing of a portrait and the framing of the photo of the current monarch. Instruct schools and colleges to hang this portrait on their grounds in a prominent position for all to see.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government isn't responsible for decisions on decoration.
